name: Cubis (fai227)
description:
It’s a simple Tetris game, but in 3D.

Have fun with stacking blocks in various rotations.

Controls

In addition to keyboard and mouse controls, the game also supports controller input.

Single Player

You can compete with players from around the world in the 40 Lines mode and Score Attack mode.

Multiplayer

It is possible to play multiplayer matches with up to four players.
